channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: Get the latest Apple news and views from the top names in tech journalism.
channel.itunes:summary:
Get the latest Apple news and views from the top names in Mac, iPhone, iPod, and iPad journalism.
Records live every Tuesday at 2:00pm Eastern / 11:00am Pacific / 19:00 UTC.
channel.description:
Get the latest Apple news and views from the top names in Mac, iPhone, iPod, and iPad journalism.
Records live every Tuesday at 2:00pm Eastern / 11:00am Pacific / 19:00 UTC.
channel.itunes:keywords: TWiT, Technology, Macintosh, Apple, Mac OS X, iPhone, iPad, iOS, iMac

item.title: MBW 643: An Apple Branded Faraday Cage
item.itunes:title: An Apple Branded Faraday Cage
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Apple Hits Peak Smartphone
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, MBW, tim cook, earnings, China, Steve Balmer, Steve Jobs, iot, Homekit, CES, privacy, iPhone, services, qualcomm, itunes, samsung, netflix, fortnite, brydge, iPad
item.description:
• Tim Cook warns that earnings are not where they should be. Is China to blame?
  • In the age of peak smartphone, Apple needs other revenues. Could IoT save them?
  • Apple throws some shade at CES.
  • Apple vs Qualcomm: now in Germany!
  • Apple plays nice with Samsung TVs.
  • Netfix stops paying the Apple tax on subscriptions.
  • Garage Band hits 15.

Picks of the Week:

  • Mikah's Pick: Dongle Dangler
  • Andy's Pick: iFixit Toolkit
  • Alex's Pick: Slopes App
  • Leo's Pick: Brydge iPad Pro Keyboards

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, and Alex Lindsay

Guest: Mikah Sargent

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • slack.com
  • WordPress.com/macbreak
  • go.itpro.tv/macbreak promo code MACBREAK30

item.title: MBW 641: Tic-Tic-CHUNK
item.itunes:title: Tic-Tic-CHUNK
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Apple vs Qualcomm, Glitter Bomb
item.itunes:keywords: TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, Apple, MBW, qualcomm, China, Austin, Pegatron, Apple Books, Cydia, notch, iOS, amazon echo, apple music, connect, paul mccartney, Emma Stone, Peanuts, Justin Lin, Adweek
item.description:
• Apple is Coming to Austin.
  • Apple vs Qualcomm in China
  • Apple Music now on Amazon Echo
  • RIP Apple Connect
  • Apple TV gets Peanuts, Justin Lin, and a new casting director
  • Glitter bombs and KFC firelogs

Picks of the Week

  • Andy's Picks: Ella Fitzgerald Wishes You a Swinging Christmas and Patrick Stewart's A Christmas Carol
  • Rene's Picks: iPhone XR Clear Case and Biggest Apple MISSES of 2018
  • Alex's Pick: Remove Backgrounds with Remove.bg
  • Leo's Pick: Apple Music Web Player

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, and Rene Ritchie

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • brex.com/twit
  • RocketMortgage.com/Macbreak
  • privacy.com/macbreak

item.title: MBW 640: Fruit Company Adjacent
item.itunes:title: Fruit Company Adjacent
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: China Bans iPhones, No Spy Chips
item.itunes:keywords: TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, Apple, MBW, Lory Gil, apple watch, ECG, China, iPhone, qualcomm, huawei, Beddit, Douglas Englebart, Mother of All Demos, super micro, Bloomberg, spy chip, instacart, TinType
item.description:
• Apple Watch ECG feature is live
  • iPhone XR's great camera
  • Global smartphone growth is down
  • Trade war heats up: China bans iPhones, US arrests Huawei CFO
  • Apple's new sleep monitor
  • 50th anniversary of the "Mother of All Demos"
  • Super Micro audit: no Chinese spy chips found

Picks of the Week

  • Lory's Pick: Instacart
  • Alex's Pick: TinType photo app
  • Andy's Pick: swap the SSD in your 2015 MacBook Pro
  • Leo's Pick: HyperDrive 2018 iPad Pro USB-C Hub

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, and Alex Lindsay

Guest: Lory Gil

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • gazelle.com
  • privacy.com/macbreak
  • LastPass.com/twit

item.title: MBW 639: Multichannel Wiener Filter
item.itunes:title: Multichannel Wiener Filter
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Apple's Best of 2018
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, MBW, Megan Morrone, iPhone, 5G, 2020, apple music, amazon, echo, alexa, siri, HomePod, AirPods, AirPower, Best of 2018, app store, iPhone Xr, battery replacement
item.description:
• Unsurprisingly, Apple's 2019 iPhones will NOT have 5G.
  • Apple Music is coming to an Alexa device near you.
  • Apple explains exactly how Siri works on the HomePod.
  • Wireless charging AirPods are coming, but where is AirPower?
  • Apple App Store's Best of 2018 list
  • The iPhone XR is the top-selling iPhone, but is it selling well enough?
  • Apple's iPhone battery replacement program is ending soon!
  • Santa and elf hats for your Memoji
  • Tim Cook takes a stand against hate.

Picks of the week:

  • Alex's Pick: "Brainchild" on Netflix
  • Andy's Picks: "The Christmas Chronicles" on Netflix, and the BBEdit Merch Store
  • Rene's Pick: Pokemon Go trainer battles
  • Megan's Picks: Joytech Music Tesla Coil Arc Plasma Loudspeaker and Apple Music Lyrics

Hosts: Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, Rene Ritchie, and Megan Morrone

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • privacy.com/macbreak
  • WAYFAIR.COM/MACBREAK promo code MACBREAK
  • RocketMortgage.com/Macbreak

item.title: MBW 638: Scamclub
item.itunes:title: Scamclub
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Apple Back at the Supreme Court
item.itunes:keywords: TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, Apple, MBW, SCOTUS, supreme court, app store, iOS, standing, hour of code, Swift Coding Club, sleep monitoring, Entrepreneur Camp, ai, malvertising, scamclub, Apple TV
item.description:
• Apple is at the US Supreme Court once again, this time to determine whether they can be sued for the iOS App Store monopoly.
  • Free Hour of Code sessions at Apple stores next week
  • Apple's Entrepreneur Camp for women-owned businesses
  • Scamclub and the latest iOS malvertising campaign
  • The Apple TV dongle that wasn't

Picks of the Week

  • Alex's Pick: Tabata Pro
  • Rene's Pick: Pokeball Plus
  • Andy's Pick: Bookly for iOS
  • Leo's Pick: Input font for coding

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, and Rene Ritchie

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • SlideBelts.com/TWIT code: TWIT
  • WordPress.com/macbreak
  • PayPal.com/growth

item.title: MBW 637: An Attractive Nuisance
item.itunes:title: An Attractive Nuisance
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Our Re-review of the iPad Pro
item.itunes:keywords: TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, Apple, MBW, ipad pro, tim cook, iPhone, bro culture, down detector, FAANG, Krisp, Shortcut Roulette, Thanksgiving Cooking Tips, Philips Hue Play, NPR App
item.description:
• Apple slashes component orders: should we panic?
  • Yes, the iPad Pro can be bent.
  • Re-reviewing the iPad Pro: Is it a "real" computer?
  • Apple CEO Tim Cook laments bro culture in Silicon Valley, calls federal regulation "inevitable."
  • Apple's Black Friday deals

Tips and Picks

  • Rene's Pick: Philips Hue Play
  • Andy's Tip: How to cook a perfect holiday meal
  • Alex's Pick: NPR App
  • Leo's Picks: Krisp noise canceling software, Shortcut Roulette

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, and Rene Ritchie

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • RocketMortgage.com/Macbreak
  • gazelle.com
  • FreshBooks.com/macbreak

  • T2 security chip: designed to keep you from repairing your Mac?

item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac Mini, MacBook Air, iPad Pro
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, MBW, ipad pro, macbook air, Mac Mini, T2, Re Hydrogen One, Pizza to the Polls, ssd, backup, Birkin, Brining Home the Birkin, SquadCast, Procreate
item.description:
• Mac Mini 2018: look at all those ports!
  • MacBook Air 2018: a thoroughly ok laptop.
  • iPad Pro 2018: yeah, forget all about those two. This is where the real action is.
  • Apple's T2 security chip makes installing Linux harder.

Tips and Picks:

  • Leo's Pick: Send free pizza to people waiting in line to vote.
  • Alex's Picks: Red Hydrogen One and SquadCast.
  • Andy's Tip: Back up your SSD!
  • Andy's Pick: Bringing Home The Birkin.
  • Rene's Pick: Procreate for iPad.

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, and Rene Ritchie

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • RocketMortgage.com/Macbreak
  • trespontas.com/macbreak promo code MACBREAK
  • WAYFAIR.COM/MACBREAK promo code MACBREAK

item.title: MBW 634: The New iPads Are Here!
item.itunes:title: The New iPads Are Here!
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: MacBook Air, iPad Pro and a new Mac Mini
item.itunes:keywords: TWiT, MacBreak Weekly, leo laporte, Rene Ritchie, Andy Ihnatko, Alex Lindsay, Apple, MBW, Lory Gill, Adam Engst, Retina Display, usb-c, Apple Announcement, macbook air, ipad pro, 2k games, adobe, apple pencil, Folio keyboard, 2018
item.description:
• The MacBook Air has been updated and has a retina display powered by 4 million pixels, and has touch ID.
  • The new iPad Pro features Face ID as well as a USB-C port.
  • The Mac Mini is back and has been upgraded and features Apple's T2 security chip.
  • It seems Bloomberg's invitation to the event was lost in the mail.
  • iFixit fought for and won our right to repair.
  • Did the Apple Watch's fall detection feature really save a man?
  • And finally, iOS 12.1 is now available.

Hosts: Leo Laporte and Andy Ihnatko

Guests: Lory Gil and Adam Engst

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/macbreak-weekly.

Sponsors:

  • PayPal.com/growth
  • SlideBelts.com/TWIT code: TWIT
  • WordPress.com/macbreak
